Author: CompletelyPresent
Text: Here's a thought:  Our values are what guides us in life. If your top value is comfort, then it makes sense to gorge yourself to sleep every night.  But comfort is a low-level desire and keeps you from growing.  Instead, find another value, whether it's a new you, love, a life with girls in it or whatever, and structure everything you do around that. Since eating poorly doesn't contribute to those values, it won't fit in to your life anymore.
